text: The list of shipwrecks in July 1848 includes ships sunk, foundered, wrecked, grounded, or otherwise lost during July 1848. ==1 July== ==2 July== ==3 July== ==5 July== ==6 July== ==7 July== ==9 July== ==10 July== ==11 July== ==13 July== ==14 July== ==15 July== ==16 July== ==17 July== ==18 July== ==19 July== ==20 July== ==21 July== ==22 July== ==23 July== ==24 July== ==25 July== ==26 July== ==27 July== ==28 July== ==29 July== ==30 July== ==31 July== ==Unknown date== ==References== 1848-07
title: List of shipwrecks in July 1848
